change_module_desc.text: Allows you to switch to a different menu.

wrong_module_number.text: Wrong module number. Please, try again!

negative_id_error.text: An id cannot be a negative number!

enter_to_leave.text: If you decide to exit the program, enter

enter_back_p2.text: to return to the previous menu

cancel.text: Cancels the execution of the current command (e.g. create/edit/sort_files)

please_enter_p3.text: , if you want to add it later

enter_edit.text: what you are going to edit

enter_remove.text: what you are going to remove

record_id_not_found.text: There is no record with this id, try again!

settings_desc.text: Allows you to adjust the settings of this menu's commands.

currency_choose.text: Choose the currency to enable or disable it:

currency_back.text: To return to the menu, enter

currency_show.text: Exchange rates for the chosen date:

days_enter.text: number of days, from 0 to 10 (days back)

choose_curr.text: number, representing the currency you need

choose_options_command.text: number, representing the command you need

exchange_desc.text: Allows you to see the official exchange rates of the Privat bank for the last 10 days.

choose_date.text: number, representing the date you need

days_list.text: The list of dates, for which you can see an exchange rate:

see_free_number.text: See rates for a chosen amount of days (up to 10 days back, developer logs).
